title: Team Quest is recruiting Top Laners (permanent position) and a Jungle Sub for this week
body:
Team Quest is recruiting Top Laners, must be high platinum or above for the upcoming OOL and SumSoc tournaments.

We are also looking for a Jungle Sub available for scrims this week (Wed & Thurs) as Telstra decided to turn our Junglers internet off until Friday. However, there may be ongoing scrim opportunities or a position in our Sister Team for the right person.

Please message me in game (IGN Bardarella) for more info.

replies.body: Note, make sure hes a tank. Also lets organise a scrim. I'd enjoy playing against the guys.
